data.description: I am part of the team that developed the customer communication platform. Tech Stack: Next.js 14, Tanstack-Query, TypeScript, React Hook Form, Tailwind CSS
I was part of the team that developed the Market project, where surplus products were offered for sale. Tech Stack: Monorepo (Nx), Next.js, Tanstack-Query, TypeScript, Material UI
I was part of the team that developed a portal in the field of car insurance. Tech Stack: React, React - Context API, React Router, TypeScript, Material UI
I participated in the React Bootcamp organized by CicekSepeti and Patika.dev. Tech Stack: JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SASS, React
I was part of an internship program where I studied Java. Tech Stack: Java SE, Java EE, Spring Framework
I studied Computer Engineering at Kocaeli University. I learned C, Java, Data Structures, Algorithms, Database, Operating Systems, and Computer Networks.
